item.title: Getting started with alfresco-share
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting alfresco-share set up or installed. Introduction # Alfresco Share is one of the one part of the Alfresco as product- it’s user interface on the Alfresco repository (platform), by default it is avaiable on <host>:<port>/share. It is built on the Surf framework. The Surf framework was developed by Alfresco, but in 2009 Alfresco began working with Spring Source and announced the Spring Surf Extension framework.
